<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get my pending surveys"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/my/pending"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves pending survey assignments for the currently authenticated user.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get my pending surveys: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/my/pending
2. For each survey, extract `TicketId` and `SurveyId`
3. Get survey details: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey) to see questions
4. Submit response: [POST /api/v1.0/surveys/responses/ticket/\{TicketId\}](/docs/api/surveys/save-survey-response-for-ticket)
5. Or dismiss: [POST /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/dismiss/ticket/\{TicketId\}](/docs/api/surveys/dismiss-survey-for-ticket)

**Use Cases**:
- Show pending survey count in user dashboard
- Build survey completion workflow for end users
- Display survey notifications

**Notes**: This is an alias for [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{UserId\}/pending](/docs/api/surveys/get-pending-surveys) using the current user's ID.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

Direction can be `asc`, `ascending`, `desc`, or `descending`. Default direction is ascending. See SurveyResponseSortField for valid field names.","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(CreatedDate|ModifiedDate|OverallSatisfaction|TicketId)(\\s+(asc|ascending|desc|descending))?$"},"example":"CreatedDate desc"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets), extract `Items[].TicketId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"SurveyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The survey that was assigned."},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User who should complete the survey.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was assigned to the ticket."}},"title":"TicketSurvey"}},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination details returned with paged user search results.","properties":{"TotalRows":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of rows available across all pages.","example":54343},"PageCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available for the current query.","example":10869},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records returned per page.","example":5},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the current page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true}},"title":"TicketSurveyListResponse"},"example":{"Item":[{"TicketId":"b1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","SurveyId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","UserId":"f1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","CreatedDate":"2024-06-20T14:45:00Z"}],"Paging":{"PageSize":100,"PageIndex":0,"TotalCount":1},"IsSuccess":true,"Message":null}}}}}}
